item.title: Projects
item.description: Project Description Technologies Used Stellaris (Game) Data Extraction Stellaris lacks an API, so I've built 2 methods (DLL injection or Python script) to read the game's memory and relay the data to external programs. Python - ctypes C++ - MSBuild/MSVC, DLL Injection Stellaris Data Dashboard Originally built as a simple display for the data from the previous project, this now also tracks the time to provide reminders when ingame tasks are nearly due.
